entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:18 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 2 except temperature steady near plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Freezing rain except rain at times heavy along parts of the coast. Rainfall amount 15 mm along parts of the coast. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2 except temperature steady near plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Rain at times heavy along parts of the coast early in the morning. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers. High 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
